senses.sense_definition: In a majestic, stately, and dignified manner, used as a musical direction.

examples.text: The conductor asked the brass section to play <w>maestoso</w> to emphasize the grandeur of the finale.
This movement is marked <w>maestoso</w>, requiring a slow and solemn tempo from the performers.

senses.sense_definition: A musical passage or movement that is played in a majestic and stately style.

examples.text: The symphony concludes with a powerful <w>maestoso</w> that showcases the full strength of the orchestra.
She practiced the <w>maestoso</w> repeatedly to ensure the chords sounded sufficiently heavy and impressive.
